org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context
Class AnnotationBeanFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context.AbstractBeanFactory
      org.lindbergframework.beans.di.context.AnnotationBeanFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanFactory
public class AnnotationBeanFactory
extends AbstractBeanFactory

Bean factory implementation for beans annotated with @Bean annotation.

Author:
Victor Lindberg

public <E> E getBean(String id,
                     Object... args)
          throws BeanNotFoundException
Get a instance bean from lindberg IOC context.

Type Parameters:
E - type of bean expected.
Parameters:
id - bean id.
args - bean contructor args.
Returns:
instance of bean.
Throws:
BeanNotFoundException - bean with specified id not found.

Creates a bean instance from class argument using args argument in the bean constructor.

Parameters:

Returns:

InstantiationException - instantiation failed.
IllegalAccessException - class access failed.

Returns:
